name: Amendola - Cremoso - Toro
additionalNotes: Manufactured at the Aganorsa Factory in Estili, Nicaragua Amendola Core Line Cremoso uses an Ecuadorian shade grown Connecticut wrapper and is a bold, creamy indulgence of flavors for the pallet. With notes of baking spice, sweet cream, nuttiness and cedar on the front.. along with nuances of graham, cinnamon, sugar cookie and confectionary flavors on the finish/retro.
